SELECT COUNT(a.sale_no) FROM ( SELECT a.order_no as sale_no, a.store_cd, a.receipt_dt as sale_dt, 'ORDER' AS sale_type , b.contractor_nm AS customer_nm, a.model_id, a.material_cd FROM tb_order a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.order_step = 'A'
UNION ALL
SELECT stock_no AS sale_no, store_cd, reg_dt as sale_dt, 'STOCK' AS sale_type , NULL AS customer_nm, model_id, material_cd FROM tb_stock WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND sale_yn = 'Y' ) a WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT a.store_cd, a.receipt_dt AS sale_dt, a.order_type AS sale_type2 , CASE DAYOFWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(a.receipt_dt, '%Y%m%d')) WHEN '1' THEN '일' WHEN '2' THEN '월' WHEN '3' THEN '화' WHEN '4' THEN '수' WHEN '5' THEN '목' WHEN '6' THEN '금' WHEN '7' THEN '토' END AS sale_day , 'ORDER' AS sale_type , a.customer_no, b.contractor_nm AS customer_nm , a.order_no as sale_no, a.catalog_no, a.model_id , a.material_cd, a.order_desc AS sale_desc , a.main_stone_type, a.sub_stone_type, a.quantity , NULL AS purchase_price, NULL AS consumer_price FROM tb_order a LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_customer b ON a.customer_no = b.customer_no WHERE a.del_yn = 'N' AND a.order_step = 'A'
UNION ALL
SELECT store_cd, reg_dt AS sale_dt, NULL AS sale_type2 , CASE DAYOFWEEK(DATE_FORMAT(reg_dt, '%Y%m%d')) WHEN '1' THEN '일' WHEN '2' THEN '월' WHEN '3' THEN '화' WHEN '4' THEN '수' WHEN '5' THEN '목' WHEN '6' THEN '금' WHEN '7' THEN '토' END AS sale_day , 'STOCK' AS sale_type , NULL AS customer_no, NULL AS customer_nm , stock_no AS sale_no, catalog_no, model_id , material_cd, stock_desc AS sale_desc , main_stone_type, sub_stone_type, quantity , (per_price_basic+per_price_add+per_price_main+per_price_sub) AS purchase_price , (per_price_basic+per_price_add+per_price_main+per_price_sub)*multiple_cnt AS consumer_price FROM tb_stock WHERE del_yn = 'N' AND sale_yn = 'Y' ) a WHERE 1 = 1
ORDER BY a.sale_dt DESC
